Bibliography

course bibliography and references for COMP 424

The course bibliography & references will be updated on a weekly basis with suggested reading, which will reflect each week’s course notes and lecture.

References will be cited at the end of each week’s notes.

There is no specific textbook for this course.

Week 15 - 22nd April 2019
  • MDN - Introduction to automated testing
  • MDN - Publishing your website
  • MDN - Strategies for carrying out testing
  • MDN - Tools & Testing
  • MDN - Web components
  • Travis CI
  • Webpack
Week 14 - 15th April 2019
  • JavaScript
    • MDN - Inheritance and the prototype chain
    • MDN - Prototype
    • MDN - ES modules - import
    • MDN - ES modules - export
  • D3 - Easing
  • D3 - Scales
Week 13 - 8th April 2019
  • Firebase
  • Firebase - database rules
  • Firebase Docs - DataSnapshot
  • Firebase docs - on() events
  • Google’s Cloud Platform
  • MongoDB
    • MongoDB - For Giant Ideas
  • Mongoose
    • MongooseJS Docs

Week 12 - 1st April 2019

  • Homebrew for OS X
    • Homebrew - the missing package manager for OS X
  • MDN - JS Objects
  • Node.js
    • Node.js
    • ExpressJS
  • Redis
    • redis.io
  • W3 - JS Object
  • W3 - JS Performance
Week 11 - 25th March 2019
  • Create your own AJAX loader
  • Flickr API - Public feeds
  • Flickr API - Public feed - public photos & video
  • MDN - JS - Iterators and Generators
  • MDN - JS - Using Promises

  • W3 Selector API
Week 10 - 18th March 2019
  • N/A - Presentations
